record.description: University of Chicago’s "Blue Girls" will appear in the 16th annual Mirror Revue presented February 27, 28, and March 1. They will perform one of the production’s feature songs, "You Look So Beautiful in Blue." Wearing their blue gowns are, left to right: Margaret Flynn, Jean Roff, Florence Daniels, Mary Jane Geisert, Beth Mahan, Joan Lyding, and Mary Lee Price.
